Interface Graph<D>

Type Parameters:
D - type of the data object
All Known Implementing Classes:
GraphAL
public interface Graph<D>
Interface for a generic Graph data structure composed of vertexes of type Vertex containing data objects and edges of type Edge

  • Method Summary

    • areAdjacent

      Edge<D> areAdjacent(Vertex<D> x, Vertex<D> y)
      Returns the edge connecting two given vertexes (returns null if the edge does not exist)
      Parameters:
      x - source vertex
      y - destination vertex
      Returns:
      the edge connecting x and y (return null if x and y are not connected)

      dest - the destination of the edge to add
